metadata.subject: Lederc de Tremblay, François, 1677-1638
Hotman, François, 1524-1590
metadata.title: Dessein perpetuel des Espagnols a la monarchie universelle ...
metadata.creator: Joseph, père, 1577-1638
Hotman, Jean, 1552-1636
metadata.description: "Attribué par Desdouvres au Père Joseph. Nabholy déclare que l'auteur est Villiers-Hotman," - Les Sources de l'hist. de Fr. pt. 3, v. 4, no. 2412

Consists of "Progres des conqvestes dv Roy d'Espagne et maison d'Autriche en Allemagne" ... First published in 1623, and attributed to Père Joseph by Desdouvres and to Villiers-Hotman by Nabholz, and extracts from various authors on the subject of the Valtellina war.--cf. André, Les sources de l'histoire de France, part III, v. 4, p. 155, no. 2412
metadata.notes: No copyright found. No table of contents found. Damaged, stained pages. Irregular pagination.
